subtask.title: Compare AI Agents vs. Sequential Prompts
subtask.objective: Synthesize findings to create a comparative analysis of the two approaches across automation and decision-making.
subtask.scope: Evaluate trade-offs in adaptability, scalability, complexity, and resource requirements.

verification.completion_summary: The research addresses automation and decision-making comparisons between AI agents and sequential prompts, covering adaptability and complexity. However, key scope elements like scalability, resource requirements, and detailed trade-off analysis are underdeveloped.
